text: Yesli zhena vidit pritesneniye sebe ot muzha ili yego otvrashcheniye ot neyo: to ne budet na nikh grekha pomirit'sya mezhdu soboyu iskrennim mirom: mir yest' dobroye delo. Svoyekorystiye postoyanno v dushe lyudey; no yesli vy blagotvoritel'ny i blagochestivy, to - Bog vedayet, chto delayete vy
